verbs.description: Elliott Broidy 's agreement to [V: pay] [ARG1: $ 1.6 million] [ARG2: to a former Playboy Playmate , Shera Bechard] , was arranged by Michael Cohen , the longtime personal lawyer for President Donald Trump .
Elliott Broidy 's agreement to pay $ 1.6 million to a former Playboy Playmate , Shera Bechard , [V: was] arranged by Michael Cohen , the longtime personal lawyer for President Donald Trump .

[ARG1: Elliott Broidy 's agreement to pay $ 1.6 million to a former Playboy Playmate , Shera Bechard ,] was [V: arranged] [ARG0: by Michael Cohen , the longtime personal lawyer for President Donald Trump] .
